content: If a car dealership sells 15 cars per day on average, how many cars will they sell in a non-leap year?

In a non-leap year, there are 365 days. If a car dealership sells 15 cars per day on average, then the total number of cars sold in a year would be:

15 cars/day * 365 days/year = 5,475 cars/year

So, they will sell approximately 5,475 cars in a non-leap year.
